name: Greek Salad (Horiatiki)
description: A traditional Greek salad made with fresh vegetables, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese, dressed with olive oil.
steps: Chop the cucumbers, tomatoes, and red onion.
Combine vegetables in a large bowl.
Top with Kalamata olives and crumbled feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle oregano.
tips: Use fresh and ripe vegetables for the best flavor.
Add capers for an extra zesty taste.
Let the salad sit for 10 minutes before serving to enhance the flavors.
